title: Perfect Crime
description: Based on a true and suspenseful story, Marine Corps Captain Danielle Russell (Jasmine Guy) disappears after meeting with her estranged husband. Joanne Jensen (Mitzi Kapture), a civilian naval investigator, is called in and is assigned to work on the case. Russell's husband, Bob (Nick Searcy), a marine corps officer, is a prime suspect and the trail of suspicion has Jensen convinced he has committed the crime. But with a lack of clues, limited witnesses and physical evidence including the body of the victim, which was never recovered solving this case is going to be harder and more dangerous than she ever imagined. Is Bob a grieving husband or a perfect killer?
